languages.text: "Убив Вольного Торговца, ты преступила Лекс Империалис, сестра, и я должен был бы судить тебя, но... хорошо, что мне не пришлось".
languages.translation_comment:
Argenta confessed to killing Theodora.
Argenta: "Now that my soul has been relieved of its burdensome secret, I feel..."

traits.locale_text: "Убив Вольного Торговца, ты преступила Лекс Империалис, сестра, и я должен был бы судить тебя, но... хорошо, что мне не пришлось".

languages.text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."
languages.translation_comment:
Argenta confessed to killing Theodora.
Argenta: "Now that my soul has been relieved of its burdensome secret, I feel..."

languages.text: 「シスター。ローグトレーダーを殺せば、お前はレックスに違反することになる。そして俺は、法に従ってお前を裁かねばならなかっただろう…だが幸いにも、そこまでせずに済んだ」
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: 「シスター。ローグトレーダーを殺せば、お前はレックスに違反することになる。そして俺は、法に従ってお前を裁かねばならなかっただろう…だが幸いにも、そこまでせずに済んだ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt eine Freihändlerin getötet und damit gegen das Lex Imperia verstoßen, Schwester. Ich wäre gezwungen, entsprechend über Euch zu urteilen, doch ... zum Glück musste ich das nicht tun."
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt eine Freihändlerin getötet und damit gegen das Lex Imperia verstoßen, Schwester. Ich wäre gezwungen, entsprechend über Euch zu urteilen, doch ... zum Glück musste ich das nicht tun."

languages.text: « En tuant une libre-marchande, vous avez enfreint la Lex Imperialis, ma sœur. En temps normal, j'aurais été contraint de vous juger pour votre crime, mais... je me réjouis que cela n'ait pas été nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: « En tuant une libre-marchande, vous avez enfreint la Lex Imperialis, ma sœur. En temps normal, j'aurais été contraint de vous juger pour votre crime, mais... je me réjouis que cela n'ait pas été nécessaire. »

languages.text: «Al matar a una Comerciante Independiente violó la Lex Imperialis, hermana, y me habría visto obligado a juzgarla en consecuencia... Por suerte, no tuve que hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: «Al matar a una Comerciante Independiente violó la Lex Imperialis, hermana, y me habría visto obligado a juzgarla en consecuencia... Por suerte, no tuve que hacerlo».

languages.text: “你杀害了行商浪人，违背了帝国法典的条例，修女。如果我当时在场，我恐怕不得不对你进行审判，不过……谢天谢地，我当时不在场。”
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: “你杀害了行商浪人，违背了帝国法典的条例，修女。如果我当时在场，我恐怕不得不对你进行审判，不过……谢天谢地，我当时不在场。”

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'i öldürerek Lex İmperialis'i ihlal ettin Rahibe. Normalde seni usulüne göre yargılamam lazım ama neyse ki buna gerek kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "By killing a Rogue Trader, you violated the Lex Imperialis, Sister, and I would have been forced to judge you accordingly, but... thankfully, I didn't have to."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'i öldürerek Lex İmperialis'i ihlal ettin Rahibe. Normalde seni usulüne göre yargılamam lazım ama neyse ki buna gerek kalmadı."
